response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, but recognizing its potential worth to you, we are excited to offer it at a special price. We propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its intrinsic value and provides you with an exceptional opportunity to benefit from its unique features. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
